channel.title: Client help!
channel.description:
Hey, ok so I got the JC 508 client the other day. And I once it downloaded I clicked on Run.bat, And when I clicked on Run.Bat The black notepad said
Java is not recognized as an internal or external program.
So what should I do? If anyone can help me can you tell me step-by-step, Because I'm kinda new to Private servers. Thank's for reading!
-Darkking711.

item.title: Client help!
item.dc:creator: @darkking711 darkking711
item.description:
@darkking711 wrote:

Em I’ll try but if anyone can tell me how to do this step-by-step it would be great !

Read full topic

item.title: Client help!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_of_Flamescape Owner of Flamescape
item.description:
@Owner_of_Flamescape wrote:

open up you run .bat and change it to this:

@echo off
title Flamescape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

then change the 3.0.8 to your version of java

Read full topic
